title: Bring back legacy client
body: The new client sucks. How to persuade 2017, just look at Trump.

replies.body: If you think the new client sucks, elaborate. Riot aren't going to do *anything* just from you saying "it sucks". You want changes? Let Riot know *what* changes you want to see. It's not too likely they'll listen unless the majority of the community agrees, though.
Pls do I hate new client =(

If you point out why you do not like the new client, then there is more of a chance of Riot listening to what you have to say.

Even though I like the new client but to my understanding, there is still a lot of work that needs to be done. I hear people are having issues with designating mastery points and creating or updating item sets. I agree that work on the new client should have been finished before closing off the old one.
